rows.label: qev041802_MSG0001
rows.name:
...Request from Ngogo? HmmmmmRRRRmmm...
Friend should talk to leader of caravan, Potepote.
Well, leader in theory, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041802_MSG0002
rows.name:
Elder Nan has been total nightmare to Pissa.
Still, dying Nopon deserve nice send-off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041802_MSG0003
rows.name:
If friend can supply infernium and autiga powder,
Pissa will craft some extra-large Nopon fireworks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041802_MSG0004
rows.name:
Phew! Pissa finally free of Potepote...
It been forever since Pissa feel this relaxed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041802_MSG0005
rows.name:
Friend can trust Pissa to handle fireworks.
Caravan will send up biggest, brightest Nopon
fireworks anywhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041802_MSG0006
rows.name:
Meh! Pissa not here five minutes before Elder Nan
start groping. Nan keep saying he wants to disappear.
Pissa wish he would hurry up and do it already![ST:wait ]
